publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1544 Jamie Hepburn: Citizenship Oaths—That the Parliament notes with concern proposals to introduce citizenship ceremonies involving an oath of allegiance to Britain and the Crown for school leavers in the United Kingdom; believes that such a scheme would be unnecessary and unpopular in Scotland, and further believes that such a scheme could undermine the tradition in Scotland that sovereignty is vested in the people rather than any one individual or institution.

S3M-1544 Citizenship Oaths (lodged on 11 March 2008) Sandra White*, Aileen Campbell*, Rob Gibson*, Bill Wilson*, Alex Neil*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Bashir Ahmad*, Bill Kidd*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Brian Adam*, Mike Pringle*, Christina McKelvie*, Robin Harper*, Christine Grahame*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-1544 Citizenship Oaths (lodged on 11 March 2008) Stuart McMillan*, Gil Paterson*, Ian McKee*, Bob Doris*

S3M-1544 Jamie Hepburn: Citizenship Oaths—That the Parliament notes with concern proposals to introduce citizenship ceremonies involving an oath of allegiance to Britain and the Crown for school leavers in the United Kingdom; believes that such a scheme would be unnecessary and unpopular in Scotland, and further believes that such a scheme could undermine the tradition in Scotland that sovereignty is vested in the people rather than any one individual or institution. S3M-1544 Citizenship Oaths (lodged on 11 March 2008) Joe FitzPatrick*
